import React from "react" import {useState} from "react" import Axios from "axios" import "./css/styles.css" function Forms(){ const [name,setName] = useState(""); const [age,setAge] = useState(""); const [gender,setGender] = useState(""); const [bloodGroup,setbloodGroup] = useState(""); const [start,setStart] = useState(""); const [startpin,setStartpin] = useState(""); const [arriving,setArriving] = useState(""); const [destpin,setDestpin] = useState(""); const [date,setDate] = useState(""); const [departure,setDeparture] = useState(""); const [seat,setSeat] = useState(""); const [tot,setTot] = useState(""); const [fare,setFare] = useState(""); const [transporttype,setTransporttype] = useState(""); const [vehicleno,setVehicleno] = useState(""); const [ticket,setTicket] = useState(""); const [booking,setBooking] = useState(""); const [verification,setVerification] = useState(""); const Submit = () => { Axios.post("http://localhost:1000/forms",{ name:name, age:age, gender:gender, bloodgroup:bloodGroup, start:start, startpin:startpin, arriving:arriving, destpin:destpin, date:date, departure:departure, seat:seat, tot:tot, fare:fare, transporttype:transporttype, vehicleno:vehicleno, ticket:ticket, booking:booking, verification:verification, }).then((response) => { window.alert(response.data) }) } return(

TRAVEL INFORMATION SYSTEM

{setName(event.target.value)}}/> {setDeparture(event.target.value)}}/>
{setAge(event.target.value)}}/> {setSeat(event.target.value)}}/>
{setGender(event.target.value)}}/> {setTot(event.target.value)}}/>
{setbloodGroup(event.target.value)}}/> {setFare(event.target.value)}}/>
{setStart(event.target.value)}}/> {setTransporttype(event.target.value)}}/>
{setStartpin(event.target.value)}}/> {setVehicleno(event.target.value)}}/>
{setArriving(event.target.value)}}/> {setTicket(event.target.value)}}/>
{setDestpin(event.target.value)}}/> {setBooking(event.target.value)}}/>
{setDate(event.target.value)}}/> {setVerification(event.target.value)}}/>
) } export default Forms
